description: Replacement tower mounted double sided digital LED advertisement hoarding (following the removal of the existing static internally illuminated double sided tower advertisement) (Advertisement Consent)
decision_conditions: The proposed LED advertisement due to its adverse affects upon the visual amenity of the surrounding area would have a detrimental impact upon the setting of both designated Green Corridors and would fail to enhance the visual, nature conservation, recreation qualities, and visual and environmental continuity of its surroundings, and would result in an undue proliferation of advertising signage, contrary to Policies 3.2, 4.1, and 4.10, of the adopted Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004) and Supplementary Planning Guidance 22 A40 Acton: Green Corridor Strategy.
